title: When in champion select client crashes and i get a loss for my ranked games
body: When in champion select client crashes and i get a loss for my ranked games , when its time to chose a champion client crashes

replies.body:
The reason you see a loss is because when you disconnect, the matchmaking system sees it as a dodge, which will count as a loss if you're in your promo series. 

When your client crashes, do you see any specific error messages? If you do, can you take a screenshot and post a link here or let me know what they say? With this context, I'll be able to provide you with steps to take in order to troubleshooting the cause.

Ive been having this happen for weeks, ive lost probably hundreds of Lp from it and a few of my promos because of it. I only took 2 photos (The rest would just say the same thing). 

https://s9.postimg.org/8hjhk9mjj/Screenshot_21.png

https://s9.postimg.org/ttdxzf3hb/Screenshot_20.png

It appears your client may be disconnecting from the platform service entirely, causing the crashes in champ select. This is often a result a poor or unstable connection to the server, and can be influenced by local network settings or ISP routing. To work toward resolving this, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you notice any changes after those steps.
